title: [K-12] VR-Based Obstetrics and Gynecology Simulation Nursing Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and foundational knowledge in obstetrics and gynecology patient care
context.additional_context: Learners accumulate decision-making and procedural skills in realistic childbirth scenarios using VR equipment, supplemented by offline group practice and feedback sessions in a classroom setting

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform obstetrics patient management protocols at 80% or higher proficiency through VR simulation.
Learners achieve at least level 3 in high-risk delivery scenario management within 40 minutes during OSCE assessments.
Learners apply three or more team-based communication strategies during VR-based problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
